channel.title: Making your character talk
channel.description:
Right, so i was just wondering, for a bluur base, 317 delta. How do i make my character actually talk? Like in runescape, when you click veng, your character says "Taste vengance!".
I was just wondering how i could make one of these commands, and maybe add in an animation...
Thanks, Core.

item.title: Making your character talk
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

So… I’m pretty new to all this coding business, and i was wondering how i would be able to make commands, when the player speaks.

Such as ::hail or w/e? Just for fun, the player would say the name of the server or whatever…

Anyway, thanks again…
Core.

Read full topic

How about you stop talking about PI and help him with his question idiot.

item.title: Making your character talk
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Ags Rush, post:7, topic:420576”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=523124.msg3805603#msg3805603 date=1320444204]
sM(" or sum shit") idk how to do delta.
[/quote]

It’s not that different on a PI. It’s like sendMessage(); on a PI, and sM(); on a delta. ++ That doesn’t solve it, it won’t make the text visible to other players.[/quote]
sendMessage(“hi”);
will send that person a text saying “hi”
Where as c.forcedChat(“taste vengeance”) will make that person say “taste vengeance”

Read full topic
